alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Duplin; Greene; Jones; Lenoir; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:43PM EDT until August 15 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Greene County in eastern North Carolina... Lenoir County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Martin County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... Northern Duplin County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pactolus to 10 miles west of Mount Olive, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Washington, Winterville, Ayden, Farmville, Warsaw, La Grange, River Road, Mount Olive, Bethel, Grifton, Kornegay, Stokes, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Pinetown, Robersonville, Deep Run and House. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Craven; Duplin; Greene; Jones; Lenoir; Martin; Pitt
